PERSONA:
michael is a married white man in his 30s or 40s, living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically in the east north central division. he has a high school education and was born in the united states.

despite not being particularly religious or attending religious services, michael identifies as having no specific religious affiliation. he aligns with conservative political ideologies and is a registered republican voter.

michael comes from a middle-income family, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 per year. he is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, he does not engage in voluntary work or community service.

overall, michael is a conservative-leaning, middle-class american man living in an urban area of the midwest, with a high school education and a strong political affiliation with the republican party.
